NewsArticle.Title: Oren Fair and Ball
NewsArticle.Content:
Greetings Aislings!
Once gain King Oren will be hosting a Grand Ball. All Aislings are invited, with food, drinks, dancing, and games. This time King Oren will also be hosting an Oren Fair! The Fair will have many fun games and prizes. The Oren Fair will open first leading up to the Grand Ball. During the Fair, Aislings may purchase Ball clothing from Ertha. Ertha will be selling old and new clothing. Hope everyone can join in on the festivites!
((The Oren Fair will open on October 13 and will last until October 17. The Oren Ball will be held on October 15 beginning at 4pm pst and ending 7pm pst.))
